lead_paragraph: Tyler Hamilton, the former Olympic gold medalist who was suspended in 2004 for doping, was 56th yesterday after the first stage of the Tour de Georgia. Hamilton finished about a minute behind the stage winner, Daniele Contrini of Italy. Contrini finished the 97-mile ride from Peachtree City to Macon in 3 hours 24 minutes 26 seconds.
